sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import '../styles/tour-details.css' import { Container,Row,Col,Form, ListGroup } from 'reactstrap' import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom' import tourData from '../assets/data/tours' import CalculateAvgRating from '../utils/AvgRating' const TourDetails = () => { const {id} =useParams(); const tour = tourData.find(item => item.id===id); const {photo,title,desc,price,reviews,city,distance,address, maxGroupSize} =tour; const {avgRating,totalRating} =CalculateAvgRating(reviews) return ( <>

{title}

{avgRating===0? null : avgRating} {totalRating===0? 'Not Rated':({reviews.length})} {address}
{city} {price} /per person {city}
) } export default TourDetails
